    • findWithFilters

      public List<AuditLogEntry> findWithFilters(Long userId, Integer roleId, Integer actionId, Instant startDate, Instant endDate, int limit, int offset)
      Description copied from interface: AuditLogDAO
      Find audit log entries with filters and JOIN user/action data.
      Specified by:
      findWithFilters in interface AuditLogDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - filter by user ID (null = all users)
      roleId - filter by role ID (null = all roles)
      actionId - filter by action ID (null = all actions)
      startDate - filter by start date (null = no start limit)
      endDate - filter by end date (null = no end limit)
      limit - maximum number of entries to return
      offset - number of entries to skip
      Returns:
      List of enriched audit log entries

    • countWithFilters

      public long countWithFilters(Long userId, Integer roleId, Integer actionId, Instant startDate, Instant endDate)
      Description copied from interface: AuditLogDAO
      Count audit log entries matching the filters.
      Specified by:
      countWithFilters in interface AuditLogDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - filter by user ID (null = all users)
      roleId - filter by role ID (null = all roles)
      actionId - filter by action ID (null = all actions)
      startDate - filter by start date (null = no start limit)
      endDate - filter by end date (null = no end limit)
      Returns:
      count of matching entries
